title: Govt taking steps for development of education, health & tourism in GB: Gandapur
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 8 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan Ali Amin Gandapur has said that government is taking strong steps for the development of education, health and tourism sectors in GB.
Talking to council members of Gilgit-Baltistan in Islamabad on Wednesday, he said foreign investors are keen in investing in Gilgit-Baltistan especially in tourism sector, Radio Pakistan reported.
The Minister expressed the resolve to provide necessary funds to complete various development schemes in Gilgit-Baltistan.
